scene.name: intro
scene.line: A roughly circular cluster of narrow radio towers sprout from a muddy field. A ragged chain-link fence strung up around the field would do very little to keep out vandals. Birds and other animals avoid the area. It is forcefully silent.

scene.name: walk-in
scene.line: The chain link fence easily folds out of the way. Shannon holds a corner of it off the ground as Conway crawls under. Inside the fence, a subtle but perceptible hum disturbs the air.

scene.name: walk-in-farther
scene.line: At the center of the circle, Conway notices a tremor in his vision. His left eyelid twitches. On the ground nearby, a few empty beer cans surround a circle of scorched earth, like candles.

scene.name: truck-radio
scene.line: The truck's radio hasn't worked for years. Not so much as a whimper of static.
